location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Camp Jeypore [Jaipur], Rajpootana [Rﾄ）asthﾄ］] to Edward Charles Ross

mods.abstract: Letter regarding appointments in the Persian Gulf and Pelly's own appointment in Rajpootana [Rﾄ）asthﾄ］] as well as the lack of official news in regards to them.The letter also discusses Pelly's play and the cost of illuminating it being too high and requesting that any illuminations along with the all the scenes be returned to him.The letter concludes by discussing William Hayward and Khyzat Ali and their positions in the Gulf.
